Main.header: Your child will learn to read with pleasure!
Main.text: Magic-phone is an intellectual and educational game for children

WhatIs.text1: «Magic-phone» is an educational game for children which not only develops the skills of correct reading and writing but also allows the child to learn independently while playing the game and without adults' involvement.
WhatIs.text2: The main set of the game consists of 5 cards with colorful pictures. One of the cards is the base with the disc which is mounted on it. There are additional sets of cards with various topics and rules of the Russian language coming soon.
WhatIs.text3: Also, the game will be soon presented in German and English.
WhatIs.fact1: Any number of children can take part in the game
WhatIs.fact2: Starting position - the arrow is directed to the lower right corner (arrow under the limiter)
WhatIs.fact3: The child chooses a word from the list and sequentially, letter by letter, types it on the phone, each time bringing their finger to the starting position
WhatIs.fact4: Hooray! The arrow pointed to the picture that corresponds to the selected word. So the word was typed correctly
WhatIs.fact5: If the arrow stops in front of another picture, it means, a mistake has been made. You need to retype the word

Kid1.name: for 0-2 years old
Kid1.text: Learn letters the fast and fun way

Question1.Title: What age is the «Magic-phone» suitable for?
Question1.Answer: The game is designed for children 3+ years old depending on the time they begin to learn the Russian alphabet.

Question2.Title: How long does it take for my child to learn to read?
Question2.Answer: We can't set the exact time but the result shouldn't be much longer!

Question3.Title: How to make an order?
Question3.Answer: An order can be made through the special form on the web-site. After confirming the order the check will be sent to you by e-mail.

Question4.Title: I didn't receive the check. What should I do?
Question4.Answer: Please contact us via the contact form. We will try to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Question5.Title: What is the delivery process?
Question5.Answer: We will deliver the «Magic-phone» to the address you provided when making an order. While confirming the order, we will specify the delivery time. Normally, delivery takes from 2 to 7 days depending on location.

Review1.name: Ivan
Review1.text: My son (4 y.o.) enjoys playing the Magic-phone and every time the arrow points to the picture correctly, he gets really excited. He can't play by himself yet but he chooses only this game instead of many others!

Review2.name: Elena

She is 6 years old, at home we speak German, so she barely hears Russian words. I decided to try this game and my daughter, finally, began to put syllables into words!  Before that I tried lots of other methods but no results at all .. In general, I recommend this game ! 👍🏼

Review3.name: Irina
Review3.text: We've been playing the Magic-phone for a month now, and the child really started to read! He perceives it as a game, not as an exercise. Earlier learning the alphabet was a challenge, now he is genuinely interested in it and wants to play. And I'm very glad😅 I'm trying to pronounce the letters with him out loud before typing, he repeats after me. Magic phone is great, thank you! 🙏🏼
